definitions.explanation_en: A given name, typically masculine, of French origin, derived from the Latin name 'Julius'. It is commonly used in English-speaking countries as a first name and may appear in literature, film, or real-life contexts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自拉丁语 'Julius' 的法语男性名，常用于英语国家作为人名，常见于文学、电影或现实生活中。
definitions.example_en: Jules is the main character in the film Pulp Fiction, known for his philosophical conversations.
definitions.example_cn: 《低俗小说》中的主角朱尔斯以其富有哲理的对话而闻名。
